section.name: Basic info
section.description: Basic tank is the first tank you spawn in as.

content.section:
- Target players with lower frontal DPS then you and players with a lower skill level.
- Stay at range of high damage classes (All Overseer, Destroyer and Shotgun classes).
- Pick your battles being Basic Tank you can't attack everything, don't target someone that can kill you.

- Basic, Twin, Triple Shot, Quad Tank, Triplet and Octo Tank were the first tanks that were added to Diep.io before the public release.
- 6 max Penetration and Damage bullets of Basic Tank deals as much damage as Destroyer and can 2 shot a max level glass tank.
